itunes:title: #150: Feeling Whatever You Need to Feel About Your Past Relationship
title: #150: Feeling Whatever You Need to Feel About Your Past Relationship
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: When relationships do not work out (Friendship, romantic, familial, or otherwise) we can have a variety of emotional responses: neutrality, intense longing and love, hatred and rage, and any combination in between. In this episode, we talk about how...
itunes:summary:
When relationships do not work out (Friendship, romantic, familial, or otherwise) we can have a variety of emotional responses: neutrality, intense longing and love, hatred and rage, and any combination in between.

In this episode, we talk about how you are allowed to have whatever emotions you need to have about this relationship in this season.
